arStrings.szText: Insert {c_highlight}Glyphs{/c} into {c_highlight}Paragon socket nodes{/c} to gain their bonuses. Glyphs drop from monsters and other sources at level 60.

Insert {c_highlight}Glyphs{/c} into {c_highlight}Paragon socket nodes{/c} to gain their bonuses. Glyphs drop from monsters and other sources at level 60.

Access The Pit by spending {c_highlight}Artificer's Stones{/c} at the {c_highlight}Artificer's Obelisk{/c} in Cerrigar to upgrade the {c_highlight}Paragon Glyphs{/c} at the {c_highlight}{icon:Marker_GlyphUpgrade, 2} Awakened Glyphstone{/c}.
